modules.description: This module parses Adobe Font Metrics (AFM) files into structured data, including font metadata, character metrics, kerning pairs, and composite character definitions. It processes AFM version 4.1 files, extracting details like font bounding boxes, character widths, and kerning adjustments for precise text layout. Use it to analyze or convert AFM data for rendering engines, font tools, or document processors requiring accurate glyph positioning.
